mapper.delete: DELETE FROM rookie.Stock_Price WHERE STOCK_DATE < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 100 MINUTE);
mapper.select: SELECT CAST(AVG(STOCK_PRICE) AS UNSIGNED) as avg_STOCK_PRICE FROM (SELECT sp.STOCK_PRICE FROM rookie.Stock_Price sp ORDER BY sp.STOCK_DATE DESC LIMIT 60 OFFSET #{param}) as mindata;

SELECT s.STOCK_CODE, s.STOCK_NAME, sp.STOCK_PRICE, DATE_FORMAT(sp.STOCK_DATE, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") as STOCK_DATE FROM rookie.Stock s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sp1.* FROM rookie.Stock_Price sp1 LEFT JOIN rookie.Stock_Price sp2 ON sp1.STOCK_CODE = sp2.STOCK_CODE AND sp1.STOCK_DATE < sp2.STOCK_DATE WHERE sp2.STOCK_DATE IS NULL ) AS sp ON s.STOCK_CODE = sp.STOCK_CODE;
